task.title: Procedure for Reclosing Bomb Bay Doors
task.shortdesc: If you have had a hydraulic failure, be sure that the bomb bay doors are not partially open when you jump.

context.p: These doors fall open â…” of the way when the hydraulic system loses its pressure.
To close these doors, do the following:

step.cmd: Open inner door— this door will not open with the bomb bay door crank installed.
Close doors and fasten crank to floor.
